name: sortable-challenge
description: My submission for the Sortable coding challenge

scripts.go: npm install --production > /dev/null && echo "All done! Check out results.txt"
scripts.dev: babel -o run.js -w -s true index.js & nodemon -w run.js --delay 2 run.js
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run run

author: Keri Warr
